title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. V, pt. 206 - Comptroller Approval Of Contracts Made By State Authorities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. V, pt. 206 - Comptroller Approval Of Contracts Made By State Authorities

State Regulations
§ 206.1 - Purpose
§ 206.2 - Definitions
§ 206.3 - Annual reporting requirement for eligible contracts and eligible contract amendments
§ 206.4 - Determination of eligible contracts and eligible contract amendments subject to the comptroller's approval
§ 206.5 - Submission of eligible contracts or eligible contract amendments subject to the comptroller's approval

R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. V, pt. 206

Statutory authority: NYS Constitution, § 5, art. X, § 5; State Finance Law, § 8[14]; Public Authorities Law, §2879-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. § 206.1 - Purpose
